coverage: A high-speed train blurs through the countryside at dawn, racing along misty fields while the first light of day casts a serene glow. In the background, distant mountains create a majestic silhouette against the slowly brightening sky. This scene captures the essence of modernity meeting tradition, blending the powerful, sleek lines of the train with the timeless beauty of the natural landscape, evoking a sense of progress intertwined with the enduring allure of the past.
